function.name: waterHeatingMode_setValue
function.description: This function is used to set the boiler's hot water supply mode.

location.description: The location where the device is located.

room.description: The room where the device is located.

device.description: The name or type of the device to set the hot water supply mode.

predefinedWaterHeatingMode.description: The predefined mode to set for the hot water supply (e.g., standard, rapid).
